item.title: Message Queue Fundementals: MSMQ
item.description: MSMQ is Microsoft’s Message Queuing service that can be used to implement both synchronous and asynchronous solutions. Typically solutions are architectured using the available C++ APIâ€™s or via the relevant COM objects. The .Net Framework exposes the System.Messaging namespace which contains all the classes that you need to work with the MSMQ API.
